issue.title: Gazebo crashes when spawning model after upgrading sdformat from 1.4.6-1 to 1.4.7-1

content.raw: That was my mistake. I broke ABI compatibility with sdformat 1.4.7. I'm going to re-release gazebo 1.9.1. For the time being, you can download the sdformat 1.4.6 deb from http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions and manually install with dpkg. Re-building will take at least 6 hours.
content.html: That was my mistake. I broke ABI compatibility with sdformat 1.4.7. I'm going to re-release gazebo 1.9.1. For the time being, you can download the sdformat 1.4.6 deb from http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions and manually install with dpkg. Re-building will take at least 6 hours.
